Name: Apollo Global Management LLC Class A
Description: Apollo Global Management LLC Class A (APO) is a prominent global alternative investment management firm, renowned for its expertise in private equity, credit, and real estate. The firm manages a diverse portfolio across key sectors including healthcare, financial services, and technology, employing a disciplined investment approach that combines deep industry knowledge with operational acumen to unlock value. Committed to long-term growth, Apollo actively pursues strategic opportunities in both mature and emerging markets, positioning itself to exploit market inefficiencies. As a publicly traded company, Apollo aims to generate compelling risk-adjusted returns for its investors, supported by its robust capital base and strategic focus.
Address: 9 WEST 57TH STREET, NEW YORK, NY, UNITED STATES, 10019
